title: Portfolio of Gabriel
hero_short_bio: I build modern web products from idea to production, with focus on business impact, scalability, and clean architecture.
ai_cv_maker_description: Enter your professional information, paste the job description, and choose your preferred language or tone. The app analyzes the context and automatically generates a tailored resume and cover letter optimized for the opportunity.
bookinvideo_description: Conceived and developed BookInVideo, a proprietary online learning platform. The first version was built with WordPress to validate the product. I am rebuilding it with Next.js and NestJS focusing on scalability, business rules, and performance.
about_summary: I am a full stack developer focused on building reliable products that solve real problems. I work close to business and product teams to deliver fast, maintainable, and measurable outcomes.
elleve_responsabilties: Built internal financial workflows and product APIs used by thousands of users.
Developed React interfaces integrated with complex back-end rules and payment flows.
Improved maintainability by structuring modules and reducing coupling between services.
rb_responsabilties: Built a browser-based label layout editor using canvas for non-technical operators.
Reduced label setup time and improved operational efficiency on shop-floor routines.
Implemented reusable UI components that accelerated feature delivery.
houpa_responsabilties: Developed reusable React components for e-commerce and landing pages.
Delivered responsive interfaces with strong focus on conversion and UX.
Collaborated with design and product teams to ship features quickly.
bookinvideo_responsibilities: Development of a proprietary online course platform focused on architectural organization and user experience.
Full-stack development, responsible for data modeling, authentication, lesson progress tracking, and front-end and back-end integration.
